title: TOT Trainer Development Program for Capacity Building of Afghan Healthcare Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Basic healthcare system comprehension and mathematics-based data analysis experience
context.additional_context: Train trainers with medical workforce education capabilities in resource-constrained environments. Emphasizes medical data interpretation and instructional design methodologies.

learning_goals: Writing an evaluation report on the effectiveness of educational programs through mathematical analysis of medical statistical data
Designing and demonstrating one Train-the-Trainer (TOT) module applicable in resource-constrained environments
Proposing three strategies to enhance trainees' competencies through project-based assessments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
